Title: Utilizing Official Support for Xiaohongshu Notes
Content: When posting notes on Xiaohongshu, leveraging official support can significantly boost your visibility. The 'Note Inspiration' feature provides various topics that receive official backing. After selecting a topic, you will receive a notification in the message section of your Xiaohongshu app. It's crucial to utilize this support by consistently posting notes under these topics. Initially, experiment with different topics to see which ones receive the most support. For example, if you post a note under 'Daily Fragments' and it performs well, consider using similar topics like 'Romantic Life Records' for future posts. Ensure that the topics you choose are relevant to your content. By strategically using official support, you can enhance the reach and engagement of your notes.

Title: Selecting High-Traffic Topics
Content: Choosing the right topics for your Xiaohongshu notes is essential for maximizing visibility and engagement. When selecting topics, prioritize those with high view counts. For instance, if you are posting about lingerie, search for related topics and compare their view counts. Opt for topics with the highest views, such as 'Comfortable Lingerie Recommendations' with 13.4 billion views, over less popular ones. This strategy ensures that your notes are seen by a larger audience. Additionally, stick to relevant topics; if your note is about lingerie, don't include unrelated topics like underwear. Aim to include 5 to 10 topics per note, with at least 5 being the minimum. By carefully selecting high-traffic topics, you can significantly increase the reach of your notes.

Title: Consistency in Topic Usage
Content: Maintaining consistency in the topics you use for your Xiaohongshu notes can help build a recognizable and reliable presence. Start by experimenting with various topics to identify which ones receive the most support and engagement. Once you find successful topics, continue to use them in your future posts. For example, if 'Comfortable Lingerie' performs well, consistently use this topic along with other high-traffic, related topics. This approach not only helps in gaining more visibility but also establishes your niche. Ensure that the topics are relevant to your content and avoid mixing unrelated topics. By being consistent in your topic usage, you can create a cohesive and engaging profile that attracts and retains followers.
